{{Wired embedded system |brand=Huawei |model=HG8245 |revision=GTH (Ver.A) |asin= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=common |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/10/2017 |fcc_id=QISEG8245H |pcb_id=HG8240GTH VER.A |type=fiber gateway, ONT |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=HiSilicon |cpu1_model=SD5113;SD5113RBI; |cpu1_cspeed=530 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29F1G08A |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS5162GFR |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 5-pin header,, unpopulated |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9227;AR9227-BC2A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8316;AR8316-AK1E; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=VoIP Phone Chip;Legerity;Le88266DLC;;1; |flags=GPON, VoIP, POTS |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=HUAWEI-XXXX |default_ip=192.168.18.1 |default_user=Epuser |default_pass=userEp |oui_eth=00:25:9E, 04:BD:70 }} {{TagLine|EchoLife HG8245 Optical Network Terminal (ONT)}} :[http://www1.huawei.com/en/products/fixed-access/fttx/ont/hg8245/index.htm Product page] Huawei HG8245 is a GPON Optical Network Terminal. :The SoC seems to be an [http://www.hisilicon.com/products/digital.html HiSilicon] SD5113, here is the PCB. {{SCollapse|Description: |
*http://forum.kitz.co.uk/index.php?topic=10561.0

"The GPL'ed source code for the HG8240 released by BT Openreach 
indicates that the SD5113RBI is an ARM11 core from HiSilicon, 
the semiconductor arm of Huawei. 

The CPU is clocked at 530MHz and has a DDR2 memory bus.

*http://www.7-cpu.com/cpu/ARM11.html
*http://www.openreach.co.uk/orpg/home/products/super-fastfibreaccess/superfastfibre.do
